div.p: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?
I can imagine my life in 10 years time, I will be in South of America to work and live. I want to be free. I will work in an NGO to help people or environment there because I care about that.

I will be independant, I'll change often the place where I work because I like changements in my life. I want to know differents countries in this area of the world. I will meet a woman who wants to live like me and maybe we will get children together.
